I'm Demetri Ganoff. I work at HD Supply on their enterprise web team.

My role includes front-end development, project management, and mobile/web app design & development.

Check Out My CV/Resume

In my freetime, I like to tinker with my side projects and code experiments on CodePen. Check em' out in my code playground!

Things that happened before today:

2014

Launched First Public App

January 15, 2014

Launched the official HD Supply White Cap iOS and Android app in their respective app stores. Used Appcelerator platform to develop this cross-platform app with the mobile team at HD Supply.

2013

Rebuilt DemetriDesign.com

October 21, 2013

Completely rebuilt my personal site so I could learn some new tricks and put them to practical use. Check out my blog post about it here.

Redesigned Brock & Scott Law Firm Website

July, 2013

Worked with committee of Law Firm Partners to completely redesign and develop their website. Used responsive web design, interactive SVG and icon fonts for retina support.

2012

Moved to North Carolina

July, 2012

Moved from Orlando, FL to Winston-Salem, NC. Working remotely full-time.

Launched DemetriDesign.com

January, 2012

Originally created as a WordPress theme. Fully responsive with CSS3 animations.

2011

Attended Future of Web Design NYC Conference

October, 2011

Participated in SASS workshop following the conference.

Launched HD Supply Location Finder

August, 2011

My first responsive web design project. Designed and developed a branch location finder web app for all screen sizes.

2008

Graduated from University of Central Florida

December, 2008

Bachelor of Arts in Digital Media

2007

Started working at HD Supply

June 27, 2007

First IT intern at the Orlando Corporate office.

Hand crafted by Demetri Ganoff.
